reviews_data.review_text: Ordered curbside pick-up; perhaps it was a system glitch.  No one brought it out. After waiting for more than 20 mins, went in & got the bag off the shelf.
Good grief already! Hire some staff!! This location has really gone downhill. Thankfully the cooks show up. SMH Indian Land and Kingsley are well-staffed with clean dining areas.
They have some good sandwiches

The food here is delicious, don't get me wrong. But I order through GrubHub occasionally and won't be doing that again from you guys. I've ordered at least 10 times from here and I think almost every time at least a part of my order was wrong or missing. On several occasions, including today, I've been brought an order intended for someone else, even though the receipt said my name and every item was checked off. I sure did want broccoli & cheddar soup and a salad today but I guess I get mac & cheese and a sandwich instead.

I came in to do a pick up order for me and my family, I bring everything home and I noticed they messed up my sandwich by not putting any cheese on it and throwing on some pickled red onions. Needless to say I was pretty upset so I go to call and talk to someone and I'm left on hold for minutes on end only to not be able to talk to anyone at all.

Although a great location, the food is not as great compared to other Panera restaurants i have been to. They would miss the ingredients on orders and take a lot of time to fulfill take-out orders. Quality of food is also not that great. Some of the staff on takeout is also unfriendly.
Awesome Panera place, food really good and fresh!! Staff was extremely helpful and professional!!
Good food and excellent service!
I want somebody to place my order I do not want to order at a kiosk plus your website is down or your app. I'm appalled that you ask me for a tip when nobody even takes my order. I'm done

I've been ordering from this panera bread many times. For dietary preferences/Needs, I do not eat eggs or meat. 1. Dine in: Went for breakfast and ordered breakfast and specifically mentioned to remove egg white from recipe, yet received sandwich with egg In it. Ordered one drink with no whipped cream, and they put whipped cream on it, no coffee and just ice and water.  2. Take out: ordered again same breakfast mentioned above and asked to remove egg white . Receipt also printed as "no eggwhite". Picked up order and came home. Egg was in sandwich.  I have been to other Panera Bread in other states and places, and this is worst Panera Bread I have ever been  Worst service Worst Food Worst drink preparation- everything my husband has to tell them to remake when he doesn't have to substitute anything except no whip cream.  Improve food preparation and pay attention to customization that Panera menu is offering.

Just sat outside for 15 min waiting on someone to bring me my ‚Äúready‚Äù curbside order so that I would not have to haul 3 kids inside. I eventually went in to get it and it was sitting right there on the shelf being ignored by the five employees standing by the kitchen. Not busy inside. Don't offer curbside if you aren't going to do it. I wish I could have my tip back since no one could be bothered to walk 30 feet to my car.

As someone who has life-threatening food allergies, eating out can be hard. I have had problems with this location in the past, with some rude managers or people not taking precautions seriously. Errors on my order, such as not changing gloves or putting the wrong condiments on my sandwich, could cost my life. However, on Monday, October 24th, 2022, I had the best experience with this location. Cynthia was working in the kitchen at the time when I placed my order and I went to the take-out window to tell her my accommodations for my allergies: please change gloves, new knife as I am allergic to some breads, new cutting board, etc. She took my allergies very seriously, even telling another associate not to touch my order because of how severe my allergies are. She was very cautious and alert with my order and she made me feel completely safe. I will definitely be coming back to this location because of Cynthia and her extreme precautions with my life-threatening allergies. The only reason I am giving this location a 4-star review instead of a 5-star review is because I have had recent complications with my orders, as I am a regular customer, to which one of them I did not even eat the food due to the employees not accommodating my allergies. At that time (it has been within the past month), the manager who made my sandwich did not use a new knife while cutting my bread and did not use a new cutting board, so there was potential cross-contamination with allergens. Also, when ordering a smoothie, there was chocolate sauce on the lid (I ordered a Strawberry smoothie, so idk how chocolate sauce got on the lid) which I am not sure if I am allergic to or not. I stress my allergies every time I dine at this location, asking the employees to change their gloves, use a clean knife, a clean cutting board, and be extra cautious, but yet some employees and managers do not understand the severity of my allergies. Cythia did VERY well handling my allergies and I will definitely be requesting her assistance next time I dine in.
Cold $3 coffee
My first experience at this Panera was great but second time around not so much.  When managers aren't there it's a bunch of teenage adults that could care less about the customers.
took 10 minutes to get 3 pieces of bread that I stood 6 feet from and no customers in the service que
Ridiculous sandwich and I never complain - roast beef and white cheddar with SO little beef. Seems to be the trend there now.
Management lets homeless people sleep in the cafe.
Excellent
This store is clean and the customer service is great! However‚Ä¶. My salad was super cold like it had been refrigerated for days. I remember in the past, the salads taste fresh. Very disappointing.

We liked Panera once, but it's all downhill now, at least this location. The takeout order was not ready on time, and once it was, the fu&king sandwich was an embarrassment. We got no untencils.  Not going back
Horrible experience today with the staff will never return.

I haven't eaten Panera in about a year. The closest one to me while I work is the one off 521 near Waxhaw and the chicken was disgusting but I was working in the Ballantyne area dn decided to give this location a try and it was great!!!
Marks ready to pick up but in reality never started. Worst place to order.
Nice and healthy..
This Panera bread is not that good bread was hard chipped my tooth and the drink station and side items were not available

I am Very Pleased with the service that I received.  I have not been to Panera since the pandemic and I wasn't familiar with the selections.  The manager had to help me and she was kind,  patient and polite.  I believe her name was Dara. My only issue was that they were completely out of napkins.  A restaurant should never be out of utensils or napkins. Thank you for your Service ladies üëç
Open early and ready with goodies!
Good like any other

Ordered delivery this morning to find out I was missing about 1/2 of my order. It happens, no big deal. But when I called up to Panera in Ballantyne, I spoke with Andy (I believe she said that was her name), and she was nothing but a delight! Found my order and immediately offered to send another driver out to correct the issue instead of just a refund. In addition, she and her team included some cookies for the inconvenience. So my daughter sends an extra thank you!!!! This location continues to be amazing every time I go. Many thanks again!! :) -Alyssa

Ordered a full breakfast and was the only person there.  The 2 ladies making my breakfast were making comments saying  "who would order this for breakfast?" Made me feel embarrassed.  Sad, I go there regularly..until today.
Out of hummus but I will survive lol
Panera Bread was good ,with ease in ordering and tasty food!.  It is a quick and easy place to grab lunch.
(Translated by Google) Delicious as always  (Original) –í–∫—É—Å–Ω–æ –∫–∞–∫ –≤—Å–µ–≥–¥–∞
Don't ever order salads here or this is the kind you will be served.  Apparently they think we should eat this kind of food here.
1st time here. They were shorted staffed so we had to place our own orders to eat in. Outside of that they were fast and clean and professional.

As always, Panera Bread at Ballantyne has very good, fresh food. There was no waiting in line at 11:30 a.m. Only one cashier handled the dine-in orders, and he did an excellent job. My daughter-in-law and I enjoyed meeting here for a leisurely lunch. Restroom was clean.
Stupendous service, Mr. Said was very nice. I definitely will come back to the Ballantyne one.

I do not leave reviews but I'm so sick of this place. I cancelled my drink subscription and am so over them. I miss the spot on Pineville matthews and Carmel. This one is my food is always late and cold. Today I called 5x after they canceled my order after I waited and hour and a half for delivery and then corporate told me it would take 15 days for my refund and we all know panera isn't cheap. I am so frustrated with them I'm done with the whole franchise
Got held over at work and was late to pick up my order. It was cold and they made a fresh order on the spot for me. Thank you!!

Had the pleasure of visiting this location to work on a project and compared to a couple of other locations, this place is amazing! From the tables to the microwave this place is spotless! The cashiers were extremely professional and so pleasant!  The music and overall ambiance was so relaxing!! Cheers to Saad, Amy and Tiffany for doing a phenomenal job!!!

This Panera is always behind on pickup times.   One employee is seen regularly distracting other employees at the prep window which seems to cause delays.  If you are on a tight schedule ordering here is rolling the dice.
Salad was great. We love this panera
Great spicy chicken
Food is always good

Here's a quick update. I would never go in there if you wanted to try to get a sandwich quickly on the way to work in the morning.  I went there the past two days they're out of the hazelnut coffee no one cares and it took 20 minutes to get a breakfast sandwich made where I was able to drink a whole entire large coffee waiting for my sandwich to go.  The service here was awful. The teller didn't know how to put in a four sandwich menu item for the customer in front of me which took 10 minutes and three people to figure out.
I ordered a Greek salad no chicken with extra feta, which I did not get.  I had to wait a long time for my order.   Customer service was a 1.
Small portions
Food and service were good. One issue is the music was playing way too loud. Especially for the patrons that come in to do work or participate in conference calls while grabbing food.
Literally nothing in display cases

Everything was ok. Just kinda blah and same as always. Soup wasn't warm enough. Also, can't for the life of me understand why a company as large as Panera, who lists vegetarian choices‚Ä¶as well as other allergens, is completely oblivious to people like me who need a gluten friendly menu.

GO ELSEWHERE. If they had a zero I would give it to them. I ordered via Door Dash an hour ago and they had the driver waiting and then lied and said the order was picked up. 20mns later it was cancelled and we never got the food. It was for a grieving mother. It was lunch. Plain and simple. I would never eat in this dumpster. Too incompetent.

I rarely leave negative reviews but have to with this Panera. I have been coming here daily the past 2-3 months ordering $12 of breakfast each day. This does not include the orders for dinner that I order. I primarily eat Panera Bread because it is healthy, quick, and tasty. Unfortunately, this morning I ordered breakfast incorrectly at the Panera near my house vs my work. I was disappointed to learn that management was not able to make the souffles despite the hundreds of dollars a month I spend at Panera. I didn't complain when I had to wait for a different order because they were out of inventory in the morning or their being late on the order and that causing me to be late to work multiple times. But to not appreciate your customers patronage by helping with a human error. It ok I'll go to Chick Fil A where I'm greeted with a smile, known by name, and they memorize my order each morning. Food prices are getting too high for customers to deal with this.
Expensive stuff. Taste not worth the price.

I love Panera and am here from Arizona. Was trying to enjoy some last minute time before my departure with some breakfast with a friend. I ordered a souffl√© and it wasn't cooked through. Was still cold‚Ä¶ stood at counter for five minutes asked if they could remake it. They said you have to speak to manager but she is on the phone: I said. Can you just remake it please, lady walked away and never acknowledged me again. Waited for manager they never came. Then asked gentleman at the front if he could help get them to just remake the souffl√© to go. He said you have to speak to manager and 20 minutes later ended up the souffl√© out with not one person giving a single care.super clean establishment, humorous treatment

Just doesn't seem like this location can get things together. I'm usually having to wait a while for my order. When I do rapid pick-up there is a 50% they don't do it, a 40% chance my order doesn't have my name on it and it's just sitting on the counter and staff have no clue what it is. So that leaves 10% it's actually correct and on time. Staff always look like it's their 1st day of work and they have not been trained. It's just doesn't look like things are going smoothly everytime I have been.
Good food. Fair pricing.
Excellent healthy options for a budget price and great chatty atmosphere. Try the squash soup.
All the coffees are empty. All the creamers are empty. Order was wrong.
Excellent customer service, Chelsea the manager is above and beyond *****
Good choice of pastries and good service
I use to enjoy the beef and broc. It was cold and no flavor. Never will I order that again.
Clean and really fast service.
Love the pride rainbows!! Food is delicious :)
My sandwich was a little to oily, but it was good. Nice lunch.
The store suffered some type of power outage and the manager and staff were FANTASTIC KAYLEIGH, AMY, ADRIANNE YOU ROCK!!!!!

Terrible experience!!, I ordered a steak sandwich with cheese, onions and something else and I received a bread with steak, I guess they don't have ingredients, also ask for a soup and they haven't soups. First and last stop in this place.
Consistent, with free wi fi. Bring your laptop & and an appetite.

Paid $7.00 for 1/2 a sandwich.  This was supposed to be a cheesesteak with horseradish spread. And this is what I got, absolutely garbage.  Along with that I paid 4.50 for a cup of soup which was 1/2 empty. I complained to the manager and did get a full refund, but I will NEVER eat there again.
Very rude employee this morning working the pick up counter. Essentially yelled at me because I was there at 7 am, when they are open.
good, as always.

Nice decor is all they got. Want the soup you ordered? They don't have it.  Half a sandwich at nearly $7 feeds a four year old. Employees cutting up, being loud in the kitchen.  Food prep kid with mask pulled down. Had to ask for water, ask for the side we didn't get. $24 for two.
Food was very tasty.  Got it pretty quickly.  The restaurant was very clean. Maybe a little pricey, but you got a ton of food.
Food was delicious service was great also.
Fast and Easy service! Shout out to the Cashier Ashley for having outstanding communication!
My first time in this store but it was great. Amazing food and service.

Chose this location to do job interviews because of the large outdoor seating area. Got there 9 am on a Friday and that whole seating area was empty. EVERY table /seat or bench (there are at least 20 outdoor tables) was dirty /sticky or had crumbs or trash. The brick pavers had old food and dried up spilled drinks, various trash items, bird droppings, and everything else imaginable. I told the cashier when I ordered, and she thanked me and said ‚Äúsorry‚Äù. I cleaned a table off, myself,  (the one with the least yucky food or trash stuck on the ground) and was there for over two hours.  At NO point did anyone come to clean or check the outdoor area. And the inside was not much better. This was at a ‚Äúslow‚Äù time. The restaurant was not at all busy and appeared to have plenty of staff. I Will NEVER eat at this location again. If the visible areas are that horrible, I can only imagine the kitchen or other places that public can't see. Disgusting. 0 stars.

2pm, on Sunday August 1st, there was a young woman with the DOG INSIDE the restaurant. The Pomeranian was sitting nicely by the owner at first , but then the dog started licking the booth sofa and picking up the food crumbs on the floor (bad for the dog). I told one of the restaurant workers about the dog, and he was surprised, but he did not do anything. I go there for business meeting every Sunday, and I never eat there (the tables and floor are not clean). The cleanliness is average or less than average, but THE DOG IN THE RESTAURANT is OUT OF QUESTION.
Excellent

This Panera Bread location is so convenient and the quality of food is good and consistent.  The issue is that every other carry-out order is incorrect - missing items (half sandwich v whole), missing/incorrect customizations, missing bakery items.  Have learned the hard way to fully check my order before walking out.  BUT... did not do so today and (surprise!) discovered only half a sandwich when I got home despite paying for a whole.  So frustrating since I can't depend on the order being correct and am paying for items not received.
Good

I love to have my breakfast in this place . I eat there every day. So far is the tastiest Panera I've tried. Everything is fresh and tasty . Matthew and Jacob are very  attentive and helpful , I would give them10 stars if I could . I recommend to ask for them  if you have any questions.
I got the pepperoni flat bread.  It was cold and not good at all.
Panera bread is simply the best place to eat.
Good food, pleasant staff
It's your typical Panera place, great food and dining experience.  Although I must say less friendly compared to other joints I have been to. Ample parking, easy to get in. Clean restrooms.
Great staff...amazing food. Exceptional service.
They were great and fast
Very slow service for two drinks

Every time I order from this Panera, I receive great service! I had one order that was wrong, I spoke with the manager working that night, Christina took care of me for sure! She went above and beyond to make sure that my remake was correct & offered me some delicious scones. It goes a long way when service and food quality is guaranteed!
I was there for curbside pickup - which was good - but I felt their portion size have reduced, especially for the soup.
(Translated by Google) Great thanks to Cristina for her kind attention  (Original) Buen√≠simo gracias a Cristina por su amable atenci√≥n
Atmosphere wonderful and food great!!!
Its a Panera. Pretty much all the same by design. The Tomato Bisque Soup got me on this cold, dreary day.

Ordered twice from this location. My complaint the first time was that the baguette and croutons were very stale. I got an iced mocha latte with almond milk and it was delicious though! However, the next day I ordered that drink again and it was made horribly so I don't feel confident in their consistancy, which is a big deal for me.
Horrible. Ordered food to be delivered to my workplace and it never showed. Have tried calling endlessly to get it resolved and no one will pick up the phone. Will be disputing charge with my bank.
Why would I even consider ordering a pizza???? You mean to tell me a chef was actually "inspired" to make this ??? Honestly this is worst than any frozen pizza I've ever had.
Good flat bread pizza
The eggs and cheese sandwich is perfect üëå
Excellent Asian Chicken Salad.
Great food, great company and it makes me feel good knowing that every Panera restaurant donates the left over bread at the end of the night to local charities and food based organizations.
Great food and beverage.
I always have a great experience when I patronize this location!! I love their bagels!
Bagels are always great.
Yum! I really like the soup and sandwich combo and the coffee is fresh too. The ingredients are always pretty good and I like the quality of most everything that they offer.
Quick and professional ..
Ok but need pay attention to the customer order
Staff was helpful and friendly and the food delicious as always.
Good old Panera

Food was fine ... Waiting for order (nothing unusual) for 17 minutes while numerous people in line behind me were served was quite frustrating ... This after waiting quite a while to order while in a long line @ lunch hour with only ONE register operating
Eat it outside in cold weather for a experience of a life time

LOVE LOVE LOVE that they've got a "masks required" sign especially since a friend was just hospitalized. Ordering was quick and easy and they made it clear all the options to choose from. And when I said "extra, extra, extra sauce and I'm willing to pay for it", they took me seriously and my food was perfect and fast!
Nice place to eat, but quite costly.  Its worth it!
The food was well prepared and special instructions were followed. Staff is friendly and the space is well established for current covid requirements.
Every time I order a soup from this place it is cold
Love that they allow you to self-serve the coffee!

Glad Panera has outdoor seating especially with good weather and makes it easy to practice safe distancing. The staff is always professional and are attentive when taking my order and will continue to frequent this establishment on an ongoing basis.
Good service
missing drive thru  here
Quiet and very helpful, plenty of great sunshine while eating.
I love the subscription coffee! I get more than my money's worth!
So many choices, and always enjoy the Pick 2! Social distancing in place, too- thank you!
Cold bread didn't bring the right ingredients and i took a long time
Super clean. Lots of great shops around.
Service was great coffee great

The curbside pick up service is horrible.  They basically left my orders sitting. Had to go in and get it after 20 mins patiently waiting.  Why do they offer curbside if they weren't doing it? Really bad customer service at this location.  They didn't even apologized.
I ordered our food pretty late which I know is super annoying, I'm sorry for that and thank you for handling it like it was no big deal. Great customer service! Food was good as always!
Very friendly staff and the manager is a very nice person.  Had a small issue with my order and he stood tall to make it right.  Highly recommend this location. Thanks Jeff Underwood
I think they were a bit disorganized at this location. I visit many all over NC daily.
The managers and employees really step up and help one another out! Especially during busy times! The customer service there is superb! Love Panera Bread!
Haven't been in awhile but glad I went today! Very quite for my best friend and I.

Got a chipotle chicken avocado melt with a baguette a cup of soup and a Diet Pepsi. I was first informed that they did not have the correct bread for the melt. No big deal. After I had placed my order and paid they told me they did not have any more baguettes. Had I known that they did not have either bread I wanted I would've come back another time. Went to go fill up my drink and the Pepsi machine was out of syrup. Disappointed. Got lemonade instead. $18.20 to have three things wrong, unacceptable. I'll take my business to another sandwich shop in the future.
Sandwiches are too small..soup was good
French onion soup came out cold.

Pretty good overall but of the 5 ppl in my party, 3 had errors with their order.  Food was good and they quickly fixed problems.  Maybe need more staffing during busy lunch rush.  I went on a Sunday, can't imagine how it would be on a weekday.
Good restaurant but cheese was out of stock! However easy and fast order processing.
Nice food, a bit overpriced though
Ordered 3 pick 2 to to- only received 2??

Got a u pick two carry out order that included the green goddess cob salad. The avocado in it was brown and extremely hard like it had been the freezer. They even left the skin of the seed on the avocado which shows extreme lack of care. Will never be back.
Good food fast nice environment

I ordered a breakfast bagel with a few add-ons/substitutions. Most of them were not fulfilled. This has happened multiple times. I don't understand why someone is initialing that the order is being checked when it is clearly not. The food here is good, I just wish I could trust them to get my order right.
There was no parking outside of this location and I waited 15 minutes for half of a sandwich. The sandwich was good but it was sloppily thrown together.
Usually the service is good. Always seems to forget something i.e. bagel with soup. But very friendly.
(Translated by Google) Pretty good  (Original) Bastante bueno
Fast and accurate as usual. Great taste.
Delicious food, great service
Nice place to start your day. Great assortment of baked goods. Ham, egg and cheese on whole grain bagel was perfect. Clean and friendly.
This is my second visit. The coffee doesn't taste right, compared to other Paneras, which is why I went.  On the plus side, it's very clean in the dining area and also the restroom.
Good food and clean environment.
Love all the healthy food options and bread and maraconi I'd great. I wish they had a macaroni bread bowl though.
I like to go to there!
Absolutely loved it

Horrible customer service! This is the second time I've experienced disrespect and disregard  at the Ballantyne location. I'm waiting on line and another cashier (Payton) comes out to help and she tells the nice white lady BEHIND me that she can help her. I guess she didn't see the black lady that was actually next. Forget the racial undertones, that type of practice is plain ole RUDE and unacceptable.
Consistent with any other Panera experience. Clean store. Quality food. Friendly service. Always a good experience. Chief complaint with this location is parking. Parking is woefully inadequate.
Bread overdone, mac and cheese old and gritty,  potatoes in clam chowder were mush, two orders incorrect...not what we are used to from this chain.  Will not be returning to this location.

Love location. Outdoor dining. Everything but the kitchen sink my fav sweet treat.  SOMEONE WANTED TO KNOW IF THEY ARE OPEN TURKEY DAY..CONFIRMED BY PHONE FOR YOU TODAY. SO SORRY.. NO THEY ARE NOT. TURKEYS THANKFUL THOUGHüôè.üçóüçóüëç‚úå
Order was messed up, went back and nobody seemed to care. This is not Panera service
Generous space, nice service, Panera has good options for a quick breakfast, and environment is suitable for quick business meetings.
Awesome as usual
Always great food!! The pick 2 is great for lunch because you don't get too full from 1/2 portions. Love their cinnamon crunch bagels!! üòä
They got my order wrong!
Good place; service was quick and friendly, and all the orders were correct despite serving a big group! This Panera has a good amount of seating.
Everything just perfect!
Really enjoyed the food. Service was üëç.

This Place is consistently good!  It is mostly quiet and even during busy times, you can have a conversation with friends and enjoy the atmosphere.  I usually stick to the same few menu items I have grown to love however for the first time today I tried the Mediterranean Grain Bowl with Chicken.  It was delicious!  I recommend this location!
Friendly service, quick delivery of food. Great tasting food.

This is located in a very busy area.  The staff here is very nice.  This like any other Panera Bread is a location where you can go to meet in a small group of people, study or get some sort of computer related work done.  The location that they chose while building this is prime.
Panera bread has a great app that compliments their locations. Order on app come pick up when it's ready.
Don't work here they don't pay employees when your dish

There was an ant in my sealed cesar salad. I don't know how that could possibly happen unless the kitchen staff isn't on top of their health and cleanliness regulations. I paid for a salad that I can't even eat.
It was good but the only drawback when I visited was that there was a man who was asking for money by making stories (came from outside). There should a person to check these type of things.
Yuck.
Great food
Delicious food.  Waiter was very nice
Great salads, sandwiches, pastries and other items
The food was good, staff was very friendly and helpful. Very comfortable atmosphere. We really enjoyed this place. When I am back in town I will visit again.
As with other Paneras, this is exactly what I need with healthy food choices and great place to meet friends, clients, or employees for a reasonable price.
The food is great here. The service was outstanding. The staff was very friendly and kept the place clean.

So I really like Panera Bread, one of my friends told me about Panera Bread a few years ago and she told me recently that she stopped going all together because her order was constantly incorrect and lately this location has really gone down. They got a makeover inside but still fall short on items they advertise, the last few times I've visited they didn't have avocados and the orders I get usually have it, I'm glad they tell you before you pay but its a bit annoying how many times I've walked out because of this. There was one time I really wanted one of the hibiscus drinks and they didn't have it or my alternative. My order gets messed up half the time I order so I've made it a habit to check before I leave. I dont know if I would recommend this Panera bread but if you do go, make sure you check your order before leaving and make sure you get your receipt, cause that has saved me a lot of arguing.
Thank you for your helpful job
(Translated by Google) Always something delicious to eat  (Original) Sempre algo delicioso para comer
My favorite place for breakfast
Big fan of the napa chicken salad sandwich
It was fine. What I've come to expect of Panera.

Second time I'm here.  And today not so good as first time. If chicken gonna go without BBQ sauce it's mean no BBQ sauce.  Waste my time with cashier about 15 minutes to explain and nothing changed...
Excellent food...excellent staff with a more than excellent manager named Jon...
Spendy but delicious and somewhat quick.
My tomato soup was ice cold. Restaurant was filthy.
Dirty bathroom, makes you think how the kitchen looks
Fresh Clean Delicious Natural  Food. Got ta love it !!!!!

This location is horrible. I ordered turkey and egg sandwich with no cheese, I received turkey with melted cheese, NO EGG. I ordered the Goddess salad with raw red onions, I received pickled red onions. There have been many incidents, these two incidents are the most recent they happed 5/15/2019 and 5/16/2019. I'm done with these shenanigans. I actually give this location ZERO STARS.

This Panera's consistency is amazing...amazingly poor. Tonight is the second time I have gotten home to find my order was wrong. Ordered a Green Goddess Cobb Salad with no onions and got a salad LOADED with onions and NO dressing. Very disappointed again. Panera, take a long last look.
Positive The food is generally excellent, reasonably priced, and on the whole quite healthy. Unfortunately their pesto was far too good, but Panera Bread is still one of the better places to eat.

I went into this location the manager told me my card was decline and I didn't have any money. They are remodeling and the bathrooms were dirty, I guess the manager assume my card was decline because I asked for water anyway he told me my card was decline again, I told him the machine wasn't working he said oh let's move down to this register by this time I was not happy about what he said and left I went to BGOOD it was a few extra steps but didn't have a problem using my card nor anyone spoke to me rude Thanks
They close more than 30 min early, even with people waiting outside

Horrible management. We place 100 catering orders a year here. Have our personal breakfast at this location over 25 times a year. We placed a small order for breakfast and we accidentally placed here since its WHERE WE ALWAYS ORDER FROM and we really needed it at another location bc we were out of town. Manager wouldnt give us the 16 dollars back and cancel the order no matter how much we pleaded. This is the same Panera who never had soap in the bathroom. How clean can it be anyway? We wont be back and we will make sure no one from ballantyne Corp is either.
Love their green tea drink
Green Goddess Cobb salad was fantastic!
Tasty as always

ordered lunch 2 weeks in a row online, with  credit card got hacked from using it on this site. Be careful. Had to cancel it the card. Now I cannot order ahead and pick it up because I have no other credit card. They do not let you call in an order to pick up . I have to go there and wait, which takes up half my lunch break. Can't someone take orders on the phone??
Great Broccoli 'n Cheese Soup, awful Cuban Sandwich. Won't make that mistake again.

The menu is of mainly light fare, with emphasis on salads and soups. The food is good. The prices are good and the service is friendly. My favorite combo is broccoli/cheese soup with a green goddess salad. Pastry desserts are good.
I love Panera Bread because you get your money's worth and it is healthy.

I just had mouth surgery so I needed to get multiple drinks and soup and the gentleman that got the drink carrier for me saw I had my hands full and decided to carry the drinks for me all the way back to my job.  I am not big on Panera and have had many bad experiences there but this one has changed my mind about this location.
Haven't been in a long time but it was a great experience! Food was great!
The food was fine, however I cut my mouth on the plastic spoon eating the soup. No more soup for me from Panera

Great place to meet friends for lunch or a quiet lunch for one. Activity seems busy during lunch time 11:30 to 3:00. Atmosphere good for meeting with friends. Local to many businesses. Parking is tough.
Amazing!! (can we get some more outlets though?)
Love broccoli cheddar cheese soup

Chicken on salad was frozen.  they were very pleasant about replacing it. The second salad had some chicken that was heated, some that was not. And the chicken was chewy and flavorless.  The dark roast coffee tasted burnt.  love Panera. This was not my best experience.
The best Place to get good and healthy food at a reasonable price,  like most Panera restaurants. The restaurant provides ample space for studying and dining in and service is excellent.

I just came from the new Panera Bread in Indian Land, SC and I am very disappointed in my order. I paid $8.01 for a steak and cheese sandwich and a small green tea and the sandwich was not good at all!!!  So disappointed and a waste of money. I could have done better at McDonalds.
Always good, especially  the giant chocolate chip cookies!!!
If you haven't tried the Hot Chocolate with carmel drizzled all over it you gotta do it..mmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm
Excellent food and service
Excellent
(Translated by Google) no parking  (Original) No parking

Obviously, as a chain restaurant, you pretty much know what  you're going to get.  That said, I thought I should "tip my hat" to good service.  To make a long story short, they rectified a situation (an issue w/ ordering on kiosk) quickly and professionally; something rare these days.
I enjoy their coffees and large menu.  It is very relaxing/offers outlets for laptops & phones.  Good place for 1/2/or group.
Good food, good service
Good food and service, coffee is alright considering it's a chain. Great option for studying and work meeting in small groups.
Lovely store! Good atmosphere!
Food and service is wonderful! I eat here everyday trying to eat healthier

Food good but pickup personnel not helpful.  When I asked for a bag to hold my dessert she put a bag on the counter and turned her back to laugh and joke with other employees.  Never offered to help even though she could see I was carrying books, two boxes of pastries, and a notebook.

This location is awful. It's so close, but I can never get a take out order that is accurate. By the time I get home, there something missing from my sandwich or something in my salad that shouldn't be. When I do order dine in, it's at least a better experience because I send the food back. They say accuracy matters, but I've yet to see this location to even get close.
To-go salads here are not freshly made, they're premade taste and appear days old. Orders are constantly wrong at the Ballantyne location.
7:30pm, out of all the pasta dishes. Out of 4 different kinds of bread. No pagers at self service. The staff were super friendly otherwise this rating would have been much lower.

I don't understand how Panera stays in businesses. Drinks are mediocre, bread is crunchy and hard, and the food is bland. Nothing in particular makes it stand out as impressive or different. For the same price, you can travel to Newks Deli, McAlister's Deli, or Chik Fil A, which offer similar products.

I have been going to this Panera location for 10 years and eat there quite often.  This past year, I have been constantly disappointed in the quality of both service and food.  They consistently run out of bread bowls, popular soups, drinks, etc.  They often get take out orders incorrect and/or due to being out of certain items, take it upon themselves to substitute without informing us.  Lastly, the lack of customer service at the registers and the dirty bathrooms have really been disappointing. As a result, I have begun to eat elsewhere. Panera has great food, I just hope they can get this location under control.
Worst meal at any Panera. They were "sold out" of bread in a nearly empty dining room. Lettuce was brown and they used cheap powdered cheese. Won't be back to a Panera soon...
My entire order with the exception on the Danish is wrong . I try to be understanding when orders are wrong and patiently waited but it's still wrong ü§¶üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è c'mon dude

for a business to be in such a nice location it sure is pretty crappy. tables are never cleaned the dining area always looks a mess. and even worse then that my real issues is being told the wrong thing several times.  we have went to panera two times in the past two sundays. each time we ask first (BEFORE) we order if they have BREAD BOWLS. they say yes we pay we sit. when they bring our food it is not in a bread bowl. and then we have to run to them because obviously they don't have enough training to say, ma'am or sir we are out but we can refund you and get you something else. Then the kitchen staff and the person standing by the food checkout always have a nasty attitude like we are a inconvenience to them. like hello if you didnt have the god damn item say no and i would have more then gladly went else where to eat. the only reason i stayed was because i was told you had what i wanted. obviously team has no training. no communication and horrible customer service. oh and BTW i use to work for panera back in 2010. so do better because we knew how to treat our customers.

I ordered a broccoli cheddar soup bread bowl, wasn't hot enough the bread that came along with it was frozen. Bloody orange juice was sour and not bloody enough. Tasted a day old ugh. Step up your game panera. Employees weren't the friendliest.
No BREAD why call in Panera bread with no BREAD lost a customer
My take out order was shorted.  Didn't realize until I got home.  Bad thing was that an employee checked it right in front of me and said all was good.
Lots o bread
Good food fast service...little pricey!
Service is slow and not well trained. The only reason we return is the food is healthy but I will not be going regularly any more.
Probably the best Panera location in greater Charlotte area. Great quality food, really fast service,  and professional team!
Good location in Ballantyne Village but parking can be tough. Always good.
Good food and pasteies
Rude associates.
The manager Chris went above and beyond to provide good service. The best customer service I have ever received at any panera location, definitely will return!
Nice atmosphere, convenient, good for business meetings.
Great food, wonderful selection and yummy pastrys
Ordered a Vegan Noodle Bowl for to-go order and it came with chicken. No-one picked up the phone after calling repeatedly. Won't go back.

Do not ever order lunch from Panera bread 14835 Ballantyne Village Way, Charlotte, NC 28277 I ordered frozen lemon drink last week in was nothing but water when it arrived sent email nothing ever done I was stupid and ordered again today ordered 2 salads and ask for extra dressing it arrived with no dressing at all called 3 times and they told me it was lunch time need to call back after lunch got hung up on 3 times never got my salad dressing paid 3$ for this to be delivered and gave driver 2$ so spend 5$ to get it here plus the 12.00 for salads and still don't have lunch.
The food as usual was excellent. Kitchen may have been understaffed as there was a 15 to 20 minute wait for a toasted bagel.
Okay
One o the nicest staff I saw in Ballantyne
Excellent food
Great sandwiches that feel healthy.
Only a two star rating based on several times of going there and being out of cream cheese. Come on, you sell bagels, no excuses.

Panera has a standard for their sandwiches and salads,  as well as a clean and comforable setting.  I do find that their salads are on a small side and I'm still hungry after a full salad and a 1/2 soup. But other than the portion sizes,  everything is great.
(Translated by Google) Very rich food and a very neat place. Excellent attention  (Original) Muy rica comida y un lugar muy aseado. Excelente atenci√≥n
I enjoy my breakfast in this branch once a week.
Yummy and fast

This is the second time I have been to this Panera and I have found green old food ( not macaroni) in the bottom of my Macaroni bowl. I asked for a new one to go and the girls in the back were too busy chatting it up that they totally forgot and never even made my new macaroni until I went up there and said something about not recieving it. Needless to say we will not be back .

I don't generally post reviews... but half the ordered items weren't included in my to go order. I should have checked myself prior to leaving the store; however, I watched two different people "check" the order. Additionally, the sandwich was very poorly put together, huge chunks of avocado that needed to be sliced etc.
Always closing before closing time
The freshest and most delicious "fast food" you can eat!!! TRY THE VEGAN QUINOA BOWL!!! OMg
(Translated by Google) Delicious food, but a bit overpriced.  (Original) Leckeres Essen, jedoch etwas zu teuer.

Panera is situated in an odd spot within the shopping center so parking can be inconvenient.  Everything else is what you expect.  Good service, consistently good food and I always leave with a loaf of bread.  You can't beat the freshness and price for the bread and they will slice it as you'd like.
Highlight of my day?...Getting this amazing Asian sesame chicken salad delivered right to my door! And my delivery person (Gabriel) was as sweet as can be! Thank you!

I've been a fan of Panera in the past but I can safely say I will never eat there again. We had been eating there at least twice a week when we noticed the quality decreasing with each visit until my wife experienced a pretty serious bout of food poisoning. About the only thing she'd eaten in the past 2 days was Panera.  A few weeks later, I convinced her to try it again. We ordered rapid pickup and got a couple of Seasonal Greens salads and a turkey sandwich. The salads looked as though they'd been made the day before. They were disgusting. The tomatoes literally looked spoiled. I can't imagine being the person that made these salads and thinking they were ok to serve.  To top all of this off, I have a relative who began working at Panera a few months ago. This relative, who has also worked at Chipotle, says they would never eat Panera unless they witnessed the food being made. Panera has very little sanitary guidelines for their employees and our relative says that cooks regularly bus tables or take out the trash and come back to handle food without washing their hands or changing their gloves. There is also no glove changing policy so you can be sure that the people handling your food are not sanitary. Its no wonder my wife dealt with food poisoning  after eating there.  I highly recommend avoiding the Panera Bread in Ballantyne.
Good healthy drink options, you can order online from your table is something that I define liked, lots of students there! I would recommend this place!
Theyre out of multiple items on the menu, but sell them anyway, then walk up and say sorry, what else would you like.  Seems like a solvable problem.

Ordered a chicken salad sandwhich all i got was bread and lettuce. This is by far the worst panera bread store in all of charlotte. I would suggest going to the new location at waverly off providence rd
Fast service, good food, clean and organized.  Ran out of bread
Never answer their phone Delivery is horrible
Always fast friendly and accurate. Love love love this location!!!
Love the food, love the service
Yummy coffee!
Bad service, customization services are horrible. You order something, you get something else.
Ate here several times and its a nice store.  Plenty of seating inside and out, and staff are quick and polite.  This location can get pretty busy and noisy so not that great for conference calls.
Delicious food and exceptional customer service!!!

Food and drinks are spectacular. Love the free drink refills. Food is a little pricey for serving size. Staff is cordial. Indoor and outdoor seating. Ample, but slightly awkward parking (shares with other businesses, some spots are tight one-way). Free Wi-Fi.
Love this location always fresh!
I normally like Panera, but this location is not so customer friendly.
Great variety of soups sandwiches and baked goods love healthy choices
Panera is always a great fast food option.
Good food and location.

Service is awful. I went every Saturday and for about 6 weeks they messed up my order. I would bring it to their attention and they would give me attitude trying to blame me for the mess up.  There are two ladies that work here that make it worth coming back as they are great with customer service and present to be around. The reason I gave it 2 starts and still go back is I can order via iPad and not have to deal with their horrible customer service.
Very clean and inviting for people to dine-in for a quick bite!
Fresh coffee , fresh pastries, and a great location with a very pleasant staff to take your order.

Second time I have done an online order from this location.  My delivery time at the latest was 315pm but did not arrive until 4pm.  I attempted to call the store to speak with a manager but no one answered the phone.  I live 1 mile from the location and it was on its way for over 30 minutes.

They BRING your food to your table..so TJAT is why they ask if ypu want to add a tip..you should! Service is great! Steak and egg bagel is WONDERFUL!!! love it here! Got some work done..not loud or crowded..
Sandwich was cold. Bad layout.

I went in this Panera and was very nice to the manager Duane but he was very very rude to me I had a few questions and he rolled his eyes and made a face to the girl he asked to help me instead.. clearly he's a dumb guy who didn't know the answer to anything about the panera rewards he gave me a bogus answer just to get me out the way and made a face which I don't understand why !!!!! Can't take a couple questions then you shouldn't be the manager!!!  .. that guy represents trash I see why he probably makes less than 20 an hr .. COMPLETE GARBAGE!!!! Sooooo happy I don't have to deal with an idiot like that in my everyday life!!! ^_^ will not be attending this panera again I wanted to throw a banana at the guy! üòÇ
The food is great and the services is better.
Amazing food excellent taste. But the quantity of food per serving is less.
Good food üòÄ
Nice good, great service but parking is the big. Problem. Best place if you want to get some work done.

Surprised how much they seem to run out of common popular menu items way before closing time. The pasteries and bagels are pretty run of the mill, they look nice but like the sandwiches, fail to deliver on big taste. I'm not a huge fan of Panera for my money, I'd rather dine elsewhere. My GF loves the place, so its just a matter of preference I guess.
First panera bread I've been too where they bring your food to your table! ! Awesome experience and I have always liked their food offerings!
No parking. Food quality is lacking
I usually like Panera Bread and would generally give 4-5 stars.  This one is in a terrible location with bad parking and bad layout.  I only go off-peak.
customer service is horrible. attitude from employees is unnecssary when trying to resolve an issue.
Good food, nice staff
Fast and friendly
Good place to see grab a bite. Can get busy at lunch
I've been in for the past 3 days... everyday and today was the first rude experience I had with a cashier 'Da'Z'... I hope it was the last I'm here for 4 more days.

Poor experience.  The nice lady trying to check me out for lunch was having trouble with the credit card machine.  She asked three people, including the manager, who would  not even stop to help us out.  I finally became so frustrated both for me a the lady at the register that I left.
Love their food, but came in at 5:30pm one day and they were already sold out of several types of bread with no intention of making any more.  They are open til 10pm.

Panera is always a good place to go if you want to get healthier food options at a decent price.  Their mobile and kiosk ordering work well but can be a little more consistent on inventory levels of deserts/bagels.  Would recommend eating at this location
fav place to study!
Positive environment.
The people are so friendly and get your order together and do exactly what you need and want everyone loves good service

Panera's food is always really good, and I like that they have added self serve ordering so that I can save time. The only knock is that the servings are not large enough for me, but I'm a big eater so take that with a grain of salt.
Quick, clean Panera Bread location.
Have made errors on take out orders
Nice and clean place
Very slow, takes half an hour to get a to go order. Don't go here unless you have alot of time.

Efficient service at this busy Panera.  I had a great chicken cobb salad with avocado.  It was fresh and tasty.  Stayed for a while and did some work.  The wifi was easy to connect to and had decent speed given that there were many others doing the same.  Was and overall good dining experience.
Excellent
One of my favorite places.  No complaints except you guys removed the Cuban sandwich form the menu

food is great.  I would go here for lunch 3 times a week instead of once a month.  BUT parking is awful during lunch and when you finally go in, the tables are full of one person who is  spread out in a 4 top table with their laptop working.   Its disappointing because I want to go here more but seating and parking make me go to other places that are not as good

Waited a long time for my to go order. They didn't have the bread that was standard with my sandwich. Other customers had same issue with bread. Asked for different cheese. Didn't put any even on my food. Horrible experience. 9/27/15

I am not usually one to give reviews but the service and the managements response to bad service was inexcusable.  Not sure if it was the weekend staff or it's just the management that is now at this location.

Nice Cafe atmosphere. Good food.
Clean, friendly relaxed atmosphere
Thus is a good place to meet up with someone or to get a bit of work done. However, this isn't a place you would want to go to get a full meal, except maybe lunch.
Food is fresh, prepared well and we like the coffee.
love the mac
This is my "office-away-from-the-office." I like the cozy atmosphere and the free wifi. I've never had bad food or service here. I'd definitely recommend it.
